name: Dot Challenge - The Hardest Game Ever
name_original: Dot Challenge - The Hardest Game Ever
description:
The Dot Challenge - The Hardest Game Ever is finally out!

Meet Dot, the square... (Odd I know!)

Use Dot to test your skill and patience with this INSANELY ADDICTIVE game by jumping over the blocks, collecting coins & power ups, avoiding DISEASE PHASES!!!

- Challenging and addictive!
- Awesome and fun visuals
- Brilliant old-school style sound effects!
- Power Ups!
- Collect coins for points
- Try to stay alive during DISEASE PHASES! At certain positions in the game, it will go CRAZY!! Try to stay alive!
- Submit your high score and challenge your friends!

***WARNING - GAME IS HIGHLY ADDICTIVE!***
